H

Heap - Interface in components
Heap provides the basic blueprint for the functioning of a maximum heap, i.e.
heapify(int[], int) - Method in class components.BinaryHeap
Fixes the heap if it is broken at the given index - "broken" meaning that the key at the given index is smaller than either of its children.
heaps - package heaps
Main executable program.
